reviewText:
Alex (James Floyd) a street orphan is recruited by Daniel (Anthony LaPaglia) to perform covert operations unofficially contracted by the CIA in Serbia. When a group of operatives are killed, Alex is blamed by his own company and he attempts to solve the crime by restructuring it by listening to a recording.

The film is a slight new concept. Unfortunately the characters are dry as is the dialogue. The scenes dragged on.

Guide: F-word. sex. No nudity
